div.bibl: CHICAGO GREEK DAILY, Feb. 16, 1925Geo. P. Chiagopoulos & Co. Real Estate Investments Established 1908, 64 W. Randolph St. Chicago, Ill.

body.p: We have always for Sale: Restaurants, Lunch Rooms, Candy Stores, Fruit and Vegetable Stores, Billiards and Pool Parlors, Shoe Shining Parlors, Groceries, Meat Markets, etc.
We loan money, rent stores and build buildings and repair buildings, and stores. We also Issue all kinds of Insurance.
